Package tage.input.action

package tage.input.action
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    tage.input
    For managing input devices such as a gamepad.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractInputAction
    AbstractInputAction is the base class from which all TAGE input actions are derived.
    BackAction
    The BackAction class defines an input action that moves the player's avatar backward when triggered, as long as certain game conditions are met.
    FwdAction
    The FwdAction class defines an input action that moves the player's avatar forward when triggered, as long as certain game conditions are met.
    GlobalYawAction
    The GlobalYawAction class defines an action input the turns the player's avatar left or right relative to the avatar's local axis.
    IAction
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by all concrete subclasses of AbstractInputAction.
    JumpAction
     
    LateralAction
    The LateralAction class defines an input action that moves the player's avatar left or right when triggered, as long as certain game conditions are met.
    PanAction
    The PanAction class defines an action zooms the camera left, right, up, and down on the camera's x and z axes.
    PitchAction
    The PitchAction class defines an input action that pitches the player's avatar up or down when triggered, as long as certain game conditions are met.
    RollAction
    The RollAction class defines an input action that rolls the player's avatar left or right when triggered, as long as certain game conditions are met.
    YawAction
    The YawAction class defines an action input the turns the player's avatar left or right relative to the avatar's local axis.
    ZoomAction
    The ZoomAction class defines an action zooms the camera up and down on the camera's y axis.
